meanings: Noun 남자 이름 ((Samuel의 애칭)), 여자 이름 ((Samantha의 애칭))

vlive.korean: 근데 갑자기 언니가 샘 하고 그 물음표! 아 물음표래 물결 알죠? But she said this and an question mark! Not a question mark but a swiggly, right? 듣기 View video ITZY : 유채꽃 feat.리아🌼
vlive.english: But she said this and an question mark! Not a question mark but a swiggly, right?

vlive.korean: '아이 엠 샘'이라고 혹시 아세요? Do you know "I am Sam"? 듣기 View video INFINITE : [FULL] JANG DONG WOO 1ST MINI ALBUM [Bye] COMEBACK SHOWCASE
샘 여자 친구는 있어요? Teacher! Do you have a girlfriend? 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 충격) 남친을 '그 곳'에서 마주쳤다 [최고의 엔딩] - EP.01
vlive.english: Teacher! Do you have a girlfriend?

vlive.korean: '아이 엠 샘' 꼭 한번 봐보세요. Make sure to watch "I Am Sam" sometime. 듣기 View video THE BOYZ : 🌙
vlive.english: Make sure to watch "I Am Sam" sometime.

vlive.korean: 여러분 '아이 엠 샘'이라는 영화 아세요? Everyone! Do you know the movie, "I Am Sam"? 듣기 View video THE BOYZ : 🌙
vlive.english: Everyone! Do you know the movie, "I Am Sam"?

examples.korean: Sam boasted that she could beat anyone at poker. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 샘은 포커에서는 누구든 이길 수 있다고 자랑했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Sam boasted that she could beat anyone at poker. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Sam has a wide mouth. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 샘은 입이 (옆으로) 크다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Sam has a wide mouth. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Sam longed for the oblivion of sleep. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 샘은 잠의 무의식 속으로 빠져들기[잠이 들어 아무것도 자각하지 못하게 되기]를 간절히 바랐다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Sam longed for the oblivion of sleep. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Sam stamped his foot in anger. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 샘이 화를 내며 발을 굴렀다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Sam stamped his foot in anger. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Sam felt her cheeks flush red. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 샘은 얼굴이 새빨개지는 것을 느꼈다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Sam felt her cheeks flush red. Add to Wordbook
